name: Goblin Boss

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

other_info: The goblin boss is a larger and more powerful version of a regular goblin. It is the leader of the goblin tribe and is known for its brutal and aggressive nature.
